sn22.70:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn22.70:1.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā …pe… vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.70:1.4: “Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, rajanīyasaṇṭhitaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo”ti.
sn22.70:2.1: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsī”ti?
sn22.70:2.2: “Rūpaṃ kho, bhante, rajanīyasaṇṭhitaṃ; tatra me chando pahātabbo.
sn22.70:2.6: viññāṇaṃ rajanīyasaṇṭhitaṃ; tatra me chando pahātabbo.
sn22.70:2.7: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn22.70:3.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi.
sn22.70:3.3: Rūpaṃ kho, bhikkhu, rajanīyasaṇṭhitaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn22.70:3.7: viññāṇaṃ rajanīyasaṇṭhitaṃ; tatra te chando pahātabbo.
sn22.70:3.8: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti …pe…
sn22.70:3.9: aññataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosīti.
